text:
Rodney Bewes (27 November 1937 – 21 November 2017) was an English television actor and writer. He was best known for playing Bob Ferris in the BBC television sitcom "The Likely Lads" (1964–66) and in its sequel "Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads?" (1973–74).
Bewes died a week before his 80th birthday on 21 November 2017 in Manchester of vascular dementia.

annotations.surface_form: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads?
